subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 Jan 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was mixed. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Guyana Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Gerlach Group downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Tripudio accusamus suppellex alveus summopere temptatio soleo via.
- AFR: Crebro ascisco amo conatus absorbeo volo.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Opportunity at Top-Tier Hedge Fund - Melbourne
body:
⚠️  CAUTION: This email originated from outside of J.P. Morgan. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hi Thomas,

Your profile stood out given your experience in metals & mining. I'm working with a top-tier hedge fund (~$2bn AUM) seeking a strong junior analyst.

Open to a confidential 10-minute call this week?

Best,
James Robertson

--
James Robertson
Senior Associate
Selby Jennings | Ph: 971.915.3717 x93764

subject: Your Week Ahead
body:

subject: Phishing Alert: Fake Compliance Training Email
body:
Security Alert.

Be aware of a phishing campaign using a fake 'Compliance Training' email. Do not click links from 'jpmorgan.compliance.training@gmail.com'. If clicked, contact IT Security immediately.

--
J.P. Morgan Technology - APAC
This is an automated message. Do not reply.
For support, pleas contact teh IT Service Desk.
